sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD( SUBJECT , CONTENT , LIKE_COUNT , VIEW_COUNT , WRITER_ID , WRITE_DT ) VALUES ( #subject# , #content# , 0 , 0 , #writer_id# , NOW() )
sqlMap.select: SELECT POST_ID , CASE WHEN LENGTH(SUBJECT) > 40 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTR(SUBJECT, 1, 30), '...') ELSE SUBJECT END AS SUBJECT , '1' AS REPLY_SEQ , LIKE_COUNT , WRITER_ID , WRITE_DT FROM BOARD ORDER BY POST_ID DESC LIMIT #startrow#, #endrow#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM BOARD WHERE 1 = 1 AND POST_ID = #post_id#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BOARD SET SUBJECT = #subject# , CONTENT = #content# WHERE 1 = 1 AND POST_ID = #post_id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT WRITER_ID FROM BOARD WHERE 1 = 1 AND POST_ID = #post_id#
